en.title: Psalm 46:5
en.verse_text:
God is within her. She shall not be moved.
God will help her at dawn.

en.title: Proverbs 31:25
en.verse_text:
Strength and dignity are her clothing.
She laughs at the time to come.

en.title: Ephesians 6:11
en.verse_text: Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

en.title: Ecclesiasticus 26:9-10
en.verse_text:
The whoredom of a woman is in the lifting up of her eyes;
And it will be known by her eyelids.
Keep strict watch on a headstrong daughter,
Lest she find liberty for herself, and use it.

en.title: Matthew 7:13
en.verse_text: “Enter in by the narrow gate; for wide is the gate and broad is the way that leads to destruction, and many are those who enter in by it.

en.title: Isaiah 30:20-21
en.verse_text:
Though the Lord may give you the bread of adversity and the water of affliction, yet your teachers won’t be hidden any more, but your eyes will see your teachers;
and when you turn to the right hand, and when you turn to the left, your ears will hear a voice behind you, saying, “This is the way. Walk in it.”

en.title: Ephesians 4:22-24
Proverbs 14:1
en.verse_text:
Every wise woman builds her house,
but the foolish one tears it down with her own hands.

en.title: 2 Corinthians 10:4
en.verse_text: for the weapons of our warfare are not of the flesh, but mighty before God to the throwing down of strongholds,

en.title: Revelation 2:10
en.verse_text: Don’t be afraid of the things which you are about to suffer. Behold, the devil is about to throw some of you into prison, that you may be tested; and you will have oppression for ten days. Be faithful to death, and I will give you the crown of life.

en.title: Galatians 6:4-5
en.verse_text:
But let each man examine his own work, and then he will have reason to boast in himself, and not in someone else.
For each man will bear his own burden.

en.title: Colossians 3:9-10
en.verse_text:
Don’t lie to one another, seeing that you have put off the old man with his doings,
and have put on the new man, who is being renewed in knowledge after the image of his Creator,

en.title: Luke 8:17
en.verse_text: For nothing is hidden, that will not be revealed; nor anything secret, that will not be known and come to light.

en.title: Corinthians 10:20-21
en.verse_text:
But I say that the things which the Gentiles sacrifice, they sacrifice to demons, and not to God, and I don’t desire that you would have fellowship with demons.
You can’t both drink the cup of the Lord and the cup of demons. You can’t both partake of the table of the Lord, and of the table of demons.

en.title: Mark 10:45
en.verse_text: For the Son of Man also came not to be served, but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.”

en.title: Isaiah 40:31
en.verse_text:
But those who wait for Yahweh will renew their strength.
They will mount up with wings like eagles.
They will run, and not be weary.
They will walk, and not faint.

en.title: Psalms 116:15
en.verse_text: Precious in Yahweh’s sight is the death of his saints.

en.title: Jeremiah 29:13
en.verse_text: You shall seek me, and find me, when you search for me with all your heart.
